info.name: † Tumblr Cursive Banner/Header †
info.description:
Replaces Tumblr's banner/header with a cursive design. Version 2 (outline with transparent text) available here.

info.additionalInfo: Version 1.2 Change Log: Unknown // Fixed coding for Tumblr's May 2015 update. 08/05/2016 // Reposted on new account. 26/07/2017 // Tidied up coding and updated credit to new username. Font used: Signarita Zhai
